entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 60%
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 26.
